trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see langword="AudioLevelUpdated" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Stellt Daten für das <see langword="AudioLevelUpdated" />-Ereignis der <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" />- oder der <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" />-Klasse bereit.

trans-unit.source: When they are raised, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> events pass an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs> to the handler for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: Wenn sie ausgelöst werden, die <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> und <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> Ereignisse übergeben Sie eine Instanz des <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs> an den Handler für das zugeordnete Ereignis.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> property gets the new level of audio input when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> -Eigenschaft ruft die neue Ebene der Audio, wenn Eingabe die <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> oder <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> Ereignis wird ausgelöst.

trans-unit.source: The `AudioLevel` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes provides the current level of the audio input to the speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Die `AudioLevel` Eigenschaft von der <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> und <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> Klassen bereitstellt, die aktuelle Ebene der Eingabe der Spracherkennungsmoduls audio.

trans-unit.source: The following example adds an event handler to a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object.
trans-unit.target: Das folgende Beispiel fügt einen Ereignishandler an einen <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> Objekt.

trans-unit.source: The handler outputs the new audio level to the console.
trans-unit.target: Der Handler gibt die neue audio Ebene in der Konsole aus.

trans-unit.source: Gets the new level of audio input after the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated" /> or the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated" /> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Ruft den neuen Level der Audioeingabe ab, nachdem <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated" /> oder das <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated" />-Ereignis ausgelöst wurde.

trans-unit.source: The new level of audio input.
